entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
